summary: A comprehensive, polished website for The Hair Emporium that elevates brand identity, showcases a full-service salon and boutique, and provides a seamless booking experience with modern, responsive design.
style_notes: Modern, clean aesthetic with a warm color palette (deep navy, muted gold, soft cream). Typography: serif headline (Playfair Display) paired with sans-serif body (Open Sans). High-resolution lifestyle photography with natural lighting. Consistent iconography (flat line icons) for services. Responsive grid layout, minimalistic whitespace, subtle hover effects, and a prominent booking button. Accessibility: WCAG AA contrast, alt text for all images, keyboard navigation.
assets_needed: High-resolution hero image of salon interior
Service icons (haircut, nails, massage, tanning, eyelash, boutique items)
